main-page-title: Online cinema IVI: movies in good quality always bring real pleasure
main-page-cut: Everyday millions of people search for movies online, and no one wants to make life more difficult for themselves - and you're probably one of them! And if you are, we've got you covered. You're one click away from the best HD movies. We don't just deliver the convenience of going to the movies or looking up TV shows, our website gives you so much more.
main-page-text0: The IVI Video Library is a constantly growing collection in Russia with over 60 thousand and foreign content available for viewing online. We were the first to sign contracts with major Hollywood studios (Walt Disney, Warner Bros., Sony, 20th Century Fox, Universal, Paramount, MGM and others) and are constantly cooperating with major Russian companies and TV channels.

main-page-text10: Discover the opportunity to watch movies online for free in excellent quality with IVI!

movies-page-text-1: The selection of films is very wide and varied, so that everyone will find something Whatever their tastes may be. Do you prefer films that are exclusively foreign of foreign production? We have enough of them: they are the golden classics of Hollywood, the soulful French comedies and temperamental Italian dramas and noisy Indian musical films. Or maybe you're a patriot and like Russian movies? Well, we have a lot of those kinds of movies, too. ...we have quite a few of them. What do you prefer - the good old classics or new releases? It doesn't matter, No matter what your answer is, we've got them all - movies from the dawn of cinema as well as 2018 and movies from 2017.
movies-page-text-2: You'll find all kinds of genres in our catalog. You'll find love movies, detectives, action movies, and westerns, westerns, sci-fi, art house, hilarious comedies, war movies, and horror, and thrillers and documentaries... In addition to «full-length» films, the site also presents Short films as well as foreign and Russian series.
movies-page-text-3: If you are interested in the most iconic movies online in a particular genre, the rubric system will help you easily navigate and find, for example, the best drama or the best animation film online.
movies-page-text-4: Don't miss out on the great opportunity to watch movies online without registration, choosing only what you're really interested in, and when it's convenient for you. After all, it's so easy and enjoyable!
